title: Target 84
description: I hide in plain sight.I am a pretty face with a killer body. Literally. I kill whatever the job calls for. Women, men, I know no bounds. Why would I? I've been groomed to do this since I was a child. Who I am? I am a monster living among angels. After all this is over, I will redeem my actions. I will walk among those angels, fallen down on red stained leaden wings torn apart.Who he is?That's a secret you'll have to discover.This is the final installment of the Bloodlines Series. ***Can be read as a stand alone.***
author: K. Larsen
